mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO event_info (create_time, id, app_id, user_id, metrics, language, page_url, platform, referrer, stay_duration, slow_resources, screen_resolution, unique_key, timestamp, user_agent) VALUES
(#{item.createTime}, #{item.id}, #{item.appId}, #{item.userId}, #{item.metrics}, #{item.language}, #{item.pageUrl}, #{item.platform}, #{item.referrer}, #{item.stayDuration}, #{item.slowResources}, #{item.screenResolution}, #{item.uniqueKey}, #{item.timestamp}, #{item.userAgent})
